options.content: High-level overview of core profiling system metrics. Look for latency, CPU and error rate spikes.

panels.description: Percentage of uptime during the most recent $interval period.  Change the period with the 'interval' dropdown above.
panels.title: Uptime [1h]

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count
{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit",code=~"5..", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/healthz"}[$__rate_interval])) by (handler)
/
sum(rate(pyroscope_request_duration_seconds_count{ juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit",handler!="/metrics", handler!="/healthz"}[$__rate_interval])) by (handler))
or vector(0)

options.content: Storage-related metrics. Look for abnormal amounts of stored data and spikes/drops in storage access.
Metrics related to Go processes. Look for any abnormalities.
List of all instances of Pyroscope, together with their build details.
